page.title: 15Niton Village Hall
page.content: Niton Village Hall is the community centre of the village.Situated in the High Street,its central position gives easy access and prominence to perform- ances and events given by the various organisations.The stone walls of the hall must have been built prior to 1762;maintenence work has been an incentive for continuous fund raising efforts from the community.The build- ing has had many uses,but under a Trust in 1936 it became "The Village Hall",administered by villagers for meetings, lectures,classes,and other forms of recreation and leisure-time occupations.Many organisations now use it,including The Wednesday Club for Senior Citizens,Niton Football Club,the Horticultural Society, the Drama Club and the Women's Institute. Other activities include Bingo,Whist Drives and Art and Dancing Classes.
